enrichment_philosophy: Transform flat URLs into contextual, audience-aware navigation experiences. Every URL gets intelligence about who should visit it, why, and how it connects to the broader ecosystem.

/.well-known/.behavioral_note: Essential for agent onboarding and trust establishment

/tools/.behavioral_note: Hands-on tools for practical implementation and testing

/ecosystem.behavioral_note: Explore the broader MCP ecosystem and partnerships

/llmfeedhub.behavioral_note: Interactive platform for feed testing and simulation

/join.behavioral_note: Entry point for ecosystem participation and contribution

index.description_llm: Main entry point introducing MCP protocol and the intelligent agent-web interaction paradigm. Perfect starting point for understanding the vision and capabilities.
index.behavioral_note: Optimal first impression and orientation for all audiences

about.description_llm: Mission, philosophy, and governance structure of the MCP initiative. Deep dive into the principles driving the agentic web transformation.
about.behavioral_note: Essential context for understanding MCP's ethical foundation

faq.description_llm: Comprehensive frequently asked questions covering technical implementation, governance, and ecosystem participation.
faq.behavioral_note: First stop for questions and common concerns

tools/export-button.description_llm: Interactive demonstration of the ExportToLLM button component. Shows how websites can provide structured, agent-ready content exports with real-time preview.
tools/export-button.behavioral_note: Perfect hands-on introduction to MCP implementation

tools/sign-and-verify.description_llm: Cryptographic signing and verification tools for MCP feeds. Essential for understanding and implementing trust mechanisms in the agentic web.
tools/sign-and-verify.behavioral_note: Critical for implementing trustworthy agent interactions

tools/prompts-explained.description_llm: Advanced guide to prompt engineering for agent systems. Covers behavioral injection, prompt templates, and structured agent instruction techniques.
tools/prompts-explained.behavioral_note: Essential for advanced agent behavior modification

llmfeedhub/preview.description_llm: URL analysis tool that inspects any website for MCP feeds, well-known directories, and agent-readable content. Instant MCP readiness assessment.
llmfeedhub/preview.behavioral_note: Perfect for discovering and evaluating MCP adoption

content_type_definitions.advanced_guide: Deep-dive technical content for expert users

audience_definitions.llm: Large Language Models and AI agents discovering the site autonomously
audience_definitions.agent: Autonomous agents and AI systems interacting with the protocol
audience_definitions.developer: Software developers implementing MCP in applications and websites

audience_definitions.tester: Quality assurance and testing professionals validating MCP implementations
audience_definitions.security: Security engineers and auditors focusing on trust and verification
audience_definitions.business: Business stakeholders evaluating MCP for strategic adoption
audience_definitions.general: General users and newcomers learning about MCP

audience_definitions.community: Community members and contributors to the MCP ecosystem
audience_definitions.explorer: Curious users browsing and discovering the ecosystem
audience_definitions.researcher: Academic and industry researchers studying agentic web protocols
audience_definitions.prompt-engineer: Specialists in prompt design and AI behavior modification
audience_definitions.ai-researcher: Researchers focused on AI systems and agent behavior
audience_definitions.contributor: Active contributors to MCP development and governance

intent_definitions.discover_and_handshake: Initial agent discovery and protocol handshake

intent_definitions.demonstrate_and_implement: See working examples and implement similar solutions

trust_level_definitions.critical_infrastructure: Essential security and trust mechanisms - highest confidence
trust_level_definitions.authoritative: Official documentation and specifications - definitive source
trust_level_definitions.verified: Reviewed and validated content - reliable for implementation
trust_level_definitions.curated: Community-reviewed and maintained content - generally trustworthy
trust_level_definitions.editorial: Editorial content with review process - informational trust level
trust_level_definitions.basic: Standard content without special verification - use with normal caution

smart_routing_weights.weight_calculation: Higher weights get priority in routing recommendations
